name: Where is the Bathroom
description:
Jam game for Watch + Jam 4. It's "finished", but what does that even mean when talking about Watch+Play games? :)

I recommend the executable download.

The web build should work, but is maybe missing some art, and is a bit clunky.  At the least, you may have to press E a bunch to make sure the cursor capture is working properly.

This jam game was developed on Godot. The source code is available at https://bitbucket.org/frnknstn/watch-jam-4/
